lines.text: I am the law!
Why did you judge me?
[Dredd stares at him]
Why did you judge me?
You killed innocent people.
A means to an end.
You started a massacre!
I began a revolution!
YOU BETRAYED THE LAW!
Lawwwwww!
[talking about the cloning project]

I betrayed this... Your council's experiment which failed, in you. I was your brother, your blood, your friend. Who betrayed who? When are you gonna stop being a goddamn slave and grow up? That's your birthright, that's your family. I'm your family, I'm the only family you ever had. Now choose!
The best thing you can do is kill me.
Why?
Because it's your only chance, brother.
[Dredd and Fergie are riding on a flying Lawmaster motorcycle, being pursued by guards]
Fergie, cover the rear!
But I've never fired a gun in my life!
What the hell kind of criminal are you?
A NICE criminal!
Bitch!

[Hersey headbutts Ilsa]
JUDGE BITCH!

[Dredd has caught Fergee trying to escape inside a servo-droid and is judging him for damaging public property]
And you haven't even been out of jail for 24 hours. He's habitual, Hershey. Automatic 5 year sentence. How do you plead?
Not guilty?
I knew you'd say that.
5 years? No! No! I had no choice! They were killing each other in there!
You could have gone out the window.
40 floors? It would have been suicide!
Maybe, but it's legal.
Judge Dredd, take cover!
They're firing 20 milimetre caseless fletcher rounds at 300 metres. The effective lethal range is 200 metres. You're safe... so what are you doing down there, Judge Hershey?
Waiting for backup.
It's here.

[During an "Ethics" class, Dredd fires continuously at a "Judge" helmet and armor]
... The Judge's standard-issue helmet and body armor. Yours, when you graduate. Lawgiver-2 standard-issue sidearm, with 20 interchangeable rounds and voice-activated round system.
[to the Lawgiver]
Signal flare.
[fires a signal flare into the wall]
Yours, IF you graduate.
[walks over to a futuristic motorcycle]
Lawmaster, with rapid-firing cannons and a range of 500 kilometers.
[turns it on; it malfunctions]
Yours... if you can ever get it to work.
[cadets laugh]
All the things you see are toys; at the end of the day, when you're alone in the dark, the only thing that matters is this...
[holds up the Book of the Law]
...the Law.
[slams the Book onto the table]

You WILL be alone. Upon retirement, you will take the Long Walk... which every Judge takes, outside these city walls, into the Cursed Earth. There you will remain for the last of your days, alone and carrying the Law. Class dismissed.
It's a lie! The evidence has been falsified! It's impossible! I never broke the law, I AM THE LAW!

[as her dead partner is being taken away]
Dammit! I was supposed to be watching out for him.
Don't blame yourself, Hershey, he made the mistake, not you.

[exasperated]
Wouldn't it feel good to have an emotion once in a while, huh?
Emotions... there ought to be a law against them.
You want fear? I'm the fear. You want chaos? I'm the chaos. You want a new beginning?
[knocks a bust statue off it's plinth]
I am the new beginning!

[after giving Rico a package, which has is Badge and a picture of Hammond in it]
So tell me, Rico, what is the meaning of life?

[the package converts into a gun and Rico points it at the Warden's throat]
It ends.
[he shoots the Warden in the throat]
[Fergee has just arrived in Heavenly Haven, where a riot is taking place]

[shrugs]
It's better than prison.
Be kind and peaceful to each other. Eat recycled food. It's good for the environment and okay for you.
The blind lady.
Who is she, sir?
Justice before your time. We should never have taken justice out of her hands.
You put order to chaos, sir.
Yes, we solved many problems, but created many more.
Status?
Bodyguard.
Commander?
Rico.
Mission?
Mission?
[chuckles]
We're going to war.
Warrr...
This here is Mean. We had to make some alterations when he was a child. Well, the Cursed Earth's a tough place on young folks.
The legendary Angel family. Cursed Earth pirates, murderers, scavengers, and of course scumbags!

[to Mean Machine, mentioning his artificial right forearm with included blade]
Does that come with a fork, handsome?
I'm free, you're toast!
your new friends, they're cannibals.
There's a maniac loose in the city!
What a coincidence - there's one out here too!

[after killing the entire council]
Now who says politics is boring...
Resisting arrest, TWENTY years!
[one of the wounded squatters jumps up to shoot Dredd, Hershey quickly shoots him]
The first degree murder of a Street Judge...
Let me guess, life.
[he goes for his gun, but Dredd shoots him first]
Death. Court's adjourned.

[having just escaped from exhaust pipe]
I'm alive! I'm alive!
[notices Dredd next to him]

[disappointed]
Oh, so are you.
[At the Aspen Penal Colony, Warden Miller visits Rico's cell]
Why are you here? Have you come for another chat?
Just a short one I'm afraid. Duty calls.
Ah, duty. Keeping these parasites here, at the public's expense.
Yeah. You especially.
I don't cost anything. I'm a ghost. And we're both prisoners here, you're behind your desk, and I'm behind this
[indicates the forcefield surrounding him]
What a clever reward from Fargo, I mean, considering the services.
When you start killing innocent people, Rico, you went beyond service.
You let me judge my own brother? You never told me sir!

My fellow Judges, have we forgotten the lessons of history? However quickly these block wars can be contained, it's clear that they're becoming an epidemic. An epidemic that should be dealt with immediately. The only solution is a tougher criminal code.
Our situation gets worse every day. 73 citizen riots in 16 different sectors in the last 2 months alone.
Violent crimes rising at 15% every quarter. If we don't increase our resources they will be inadequate in less than three years.
Three years? Our resources are inadequate now!

My fellow council members, as a city we continue to grow, and growth is painful. 65 million people living in an area designed for no more than 20. It's not enough that they rely on us for food, clothes, water, clean air...

[interrupting]
Chief Justice, this city is in chaos! For social order we need tighter reigns! Incarceration hasn't worked as a deterrent, I say we expand execution to include lesser crimes!
My fellow judges, I was barely in my teens when I put on this badge. When the time comes for me to take it off, please let me do so knowing that it still stands for freedom and not for oppression.
Illegal use of city electricity.
[rubs a hot wire on Mean Machine's arm]
How do you plead?
[Mean Machine growls]
I knew you'd say that!
[uses the wire to electrocute Mean Machine]
I'm the only one who ever loved you.
I'll be the judge of that.
[first lines]

In the third millennium, the world changed. Climate, nations, all were in upheaval. The Earth transformed into a poisonous, scorched desert, known as "The Cursed Earth". Millions of people crowded into a few Megacities, where roving bands of street savages created violence the justice system could not control. Law, as we know it, collapsed. From the decay rose a new order, a society ruled by a new, elite force. A force with the power to dispense both justice and punishment. They were the police, jury and executioner all in one. They were the Judges.

[approaching the MegaCity wall]
C'mon, Dredd, there is no way in, are you even listening to me? We can't just knock on the wall and say "Hello, Cursed earth Pizza".

There is a way in. 10 years ago, 2 refugees figured it out, through the city's incinerator, there's a flame burst twice a minute, that means they have only 30 seconds to run through before it flames again.
These refugees, they made it through, right?
Actually, they were roasted. But, the theory's sound. Shall we?
[walks away]
Maybe we should consider other theories, Dredd.
[Dredd is putting some stuff into his locker, Hershey walks up to him, quietly]

[from behind his locker door]
I can hear you thinking.
Caught your lecture today. Is that really what you think the cadets need to hear?
What I told them was the truth.
Your truth, maybe. You made it sound like our lives are practically over!
Don't you think parts are, Hershey?
I have a personal life, I have friends.
You're the smartest of a new breed, but you've only been on the street a year. You haven't gotten used to the isolation yet.
No. No, I don't think that's right. No one should be alone all the time. I mean, is that really what it's been like for you? Haven't you... haven't you ever had a friend?
Yes. Once.
What happened?
[Dredd shuts his locker and walks away. Hershey follows him]
Dredd? I want to know, what happened?

[sadly]
I judged him.
That's Judge Dredd, man!
Hey, you wanna be afraid of somebody, be afraid of ME!
You left the DNA in there for over 30 years, sooner or later somebody's gonna clean out the fridge.
[Judge Fargo is being escorted toward the gates leading to the Cursed Earth]

[reading from the Book of Law]
Let his name be recorded in every place of honor. Let him take the law he serves so well to those who have it not.
[an female officer hands Fargo the Book and an male officer hands him a special "lawgiver" shotgun]
Let him be written in our hearts and our memories forever.
[the gates open as Fargo steps outside into the Cursed Earth]
[Geiger gives Rico the package he ordered. The case slides open to reveal a Lawgiver gun. Rico reaches to pick it up]
No, wait a second! Don't touch it.
Why not?
Well, that's a Lawgiver. That's programed to only recognise a Judge's hand. You touch that, it'll take your arm off!
[Rico grabs the gun and points it in Geiger's face. The gun has accepted his grip]
Gee, how do you like that? I must be a Judge.
[he shoots Geiger]
Judge Dredd, we have to reconstitute the Council. We'd like you to consider first position as Chief Justice.
I'm a Street Judge. And I'm very late for work.
[he walks off]
[after Dredd has been found guilty and sentenced to life, he is transported with other convicts in a shuttle to Aspen prison. Fergee, who sits next to Dredd, is rather surprised to see him]
Dredd?
[Dredd grabs Fergee's hand, shushing him - but a prisoner who sits behind Dredd, who has ugly scar on his right cheek, hears that]
Don't hit me. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. Don't hurt me.
[Dredd lets go of Fergee's hand. The scarred prisoner bends forward, eavesdropping]

[whispers]
What are you doing here?
I was convicted of a crime. Wrongly convicted.

[chuckles]
Really? That's kinda weird! What are the odds? Two wrongly convicted guys sitting right next to each other?
You received the sentence the law required.

[angrily]
Five years? Just for saving my own ass? That was a mistake!
The law doesn't make mistakes.
Really? Then how do you explain what happened to YOU?
[Dredd looks at Fergee. He has no answer]
You can't, can you? Great. Mr. "I am the law" can't!

[the scarred prisoner draws a pocketknife from his right sock. The prisoners sitting next to him notice that, but say nothing. Using the knife, the scarred prisoner starts unlocking the metal framework which restrains him to his seat]
So maybe this is some kind of typo. Maybe it's a glitch. Or maybe it's poetic justice!
[meanwhile, the shuttle is spotted by several lawless inhabitants of the Cursed Earth - the Angel gang]
Shuttle comin'! Shuttle! Shuttle! Shuttle comin', Pa! Look!
[Pa and Link Angel approach. Junior points at the shuttle]
Praise the Lord for bringing us this generous bounty. My sons... gather the harvest!
[Junior and Link rush to bring weapons]
[while Fergee continues teasing Dredd, the scarred prisoner manages to free himself. A guard passes by. The prisoner waits for the guard to walk away]
So maybe you're here as some sort of field trip. Yeah! Maybe this is some sort of... surprise party.
[Junior aims a rocket launcher at the shuttle]
Whoo! Gonna catch me some city boy!
[the scarred prisoner moves forward, attempting to slice Dredd's throat with his knife. Fergee yells in fear. The guards turn their attention to the fight]
It's payback time, Dredd!

[while Dredd struggles to move the knife away, Junior shoots a rocket at the shuttle. Just as Dredd punches the scarred prisoner away from him, the rocket hits the shuttle. The guard, who rushed to stop the fight, collapses. His gun goes off, hitting the pilots and the shuttle controls. The shuttle is caught in fire and goes down, deviating from course]
Dredd, what's happening?
[the Angel gang watch how the shuttle is partially destroyed in series of explosions and crashes to the ground]
By a blast of God they perish, and by a breath of His nostrils are they consumed. Hallelujah!
[when Dredd and Fergee regain consciousness, they find themselves in a dark building, their hands tied with thick ropes to the ceiling, several feet above the ground]
Am I dead? Am I dead? I'm dead!

[the notorious Angel gang enters the room, chuckling. They are dirty, vicious-looking thugs. The most hideous is the cyborg Mean - he has a mechanical right arm, and his skull is covered with a metal dome with a dial on the front. Link and Junior carry a body from the shuttle. Mean carries a helmet on his mechanical arm. Pa Angel looks at the captives]
Awake? Good! We're running out of sinners.
[Mean throws the helmet away. The four thugs approach the captives. Fergee is filled with fear]
Oh, my God! Dredd, do something!

[surprised]
Dredd?

[whispers to Fregee]
You talk too much.
Can it be?
[Fergee gasps in fear when Pa Angel points his staff, but he only uses it to press on Dredd's right arm in order to see his face]
The great man of the law himself.
[convinced that the prisoner is indeed Dredd, Pa Angel bursts out laughing]
O Lord, you have blessed us indeed! Judge "rat" Dredd.
You creeps are under arrest.

[unimpressed, waving his mechanical arm menacingly]
Is that so? Let me crush him, Pa!
Excuse me. We're not together.
[the Angels burst out laughing]
Allow me to introduce you to my family. There's Link, my oldest.
Bite me!
Hi!
My youngest, Junior.

[slightly moves his hat]
Howdy!
Hi!
[Pa Angel introduces Mean]

[pats on Mean's shoulder]
And this here is Mean.
[Pa Angel caresses Mean's cheek]
We had to make some alterations when he was a child. The Cursed Earth's a tough place on young folks.
[Pa Angel turns the dial on Mean's skull to level 1. Mean snarls]
Now have him set on 1. I don't suggest you make him angry.
[Fergee shakes his head]

[contemptuously]
The legendary Angel family. Cursed Earth pirates, murderers, scavengers. And, of course, scumbags.

[rolls his eyes upward]
Oh, that'll win 'em over!
Did I leave something out, "Pa"?
[Pa Angel smiles widely, amused rather than offended]
Let me kill 'im, Pa. I want his ears.
I want his teeth!
[Mean draws several blades from his mechanical arm, holding them close to Dredd's throat. Mean chuckles, but Dredd is unimpressed]
Does that come with a fork, handsome?

[Mean snarls, then bends his head backwards and butts into Dredd's face. Fergee shuts his eyes. The blow leaves bleeding gash on Dredd's left temple. Again, Mean holds the blades close to Dredd's throat]
Hallelujah, brother!
[surprised, the Angels turn their attention to Fergee]

[caresses Fregee's cheek]
Wait a minute. Can it be? Can it be that from the city of the fallen we have one of the faithful?
[hearing that, Fergee believes incorrectly that he has hope of survival]

[Fergee tries to convince the Angel gang that he is a believer, thinking incorrectly that they will let him live. While the attention of the Angels is turned on Fregee, Dredd struggles to get his hands free]
Amen, brother! Praise the Lord! I'm a believer!

[whispers]
Fergee, don't do it.
It sounds like we have a believer in the gallery.
Yes!
Cut him down.
Go tell it on the mountain!
Fergee!
[Fergee ignores Dredd's warnings. Link steps forward and cuts Fergee's bindings]
Yeah!

[to Fergee]
You're making a big mistake.

[chuckles gloatingly]
Well, Dredd, maybe the law doesn't make mistakes, but I'm free - and you're a toast.

[dryly]
Actually, YOU'RE a toast. I forgot to mention it. Your new friends... they're cannibals.
[Fergee's smile fades as the Angels grab him roughly and drag him to the fire]
Fresh meat.
Prepare the supplicant for sacrifice!
[as Link and Junior drag poor Fergee to the fire, Dredd manages to free his left hand from the ropes. The Angels fail to notice that]
No, wait. You can't eat me! I've got eczema. I've got warts. I've had gonorrhea. Eat Dredd! He works out.
[Fergee's eyes widen in fear when he sees what is cooking over the fire - something that clearly was once human]

[looks disgustingly at Dredd]
Yum, yum. It's been fun, lawman.
[Pa Angel turns Mean's dial to level 2. Mean snarls]

[pats on Mean's shoulder]
Finish Dredd.
My pleasure, Pa!
[Mean is about to attack Dredd]
C'mon...

[as Mean bends his head backwards and charges, Dredd removes his left hand from the ropes and dodges, getting himself free. Mean butts a column. The column breaks on impact, leaving Mean momentarily stunned]

[to Link and Junior]
C'mon!
[Junior charges at Dredd, waving a gun]
C'mon, kid!
[before Junior can shoot, Dredd wraps the rope around his hand, snatches the gun and punches Junior's face. Junior collapses. Link draws a dagger and charges at Dredd]
Guilty!
[Dredd shoots and kills Link. Mean recovers, snarling]
Oh, shut up!

[before Mean can get up on his feet, Dredd turns his dial to zero, shutting him off. Junior draws a dagger and charges Dredd. Dredd dodges, wraps the rope around Junior's neck and drops on over his shoulder, breaking his neck]
Dredd, look out!

[Pa Angel growls in rage and charges at Dredd, waving his heavy staff. Dredd rolls away and grabs a dagger, preparing to fight Pa Angel, when suddenly several shots hit Pa, killing him. Some guards appear]
There's Dredd!

[Dredd drops the dagger and jumps to the platform above, dodging the guards' shots. He tackles one of the guards and grabs his weapon. Dredd shoots and kills the other four guards. When the shooting cease, Fergee rises on his feet. Dredd waits for more guards, but when none appear, he drops the gun. Fergee approaches Dredd, warily pats on his shoulder]

[talks as if he took part in the fight]
Well, we did it. We got 'em all. Pussies! Is that all you got? They are dead, right?
[Dredd turns to Fergee and grabs his upper lip]

[touches Fergee's cheek]
Have you been crying?

[angrily]
I'm not crying. I got something in my eye. You ever have allergies?
[Dredd lets go of Fergee. Fergee looks behind Dredd, and suddenly he spots one more guard]
Dredd, look out!

[as the last guard is about to shoot Dredd, a shot hits and kills him. An armed hooded figure appears. Dredd and Fergee stare at the hooded person, uncertain whether it is friend or foe. Dredd is surprised as the figure removes its hood, revealing itself as ex-Chief Justice Fargo - who was like a father to him]
Chief Justice!
Joseph, together again.
Together again, sir.
[suddenly Fargo shrieks in agony, as he is stabbed in the back by Mean. The blade sinks into his body and protrudes from his chest]
No!
[Mean smiles viciously, as Fargo is skewered on his blade. Enraged, Dredd charges at the cyborg. Mean throws Fargo's body off his blade and faces Dredd]
No!
God, not again!

[Dredd grabs Pa Angel's staff and attacks Mean, but Mean easily knocks the staff off Dredd's hands and butts him in the face. Dredd stumbles and falls to the floor, but immediately recovers and picks a metal bar]
You got three strikes, lawman!
[Dredd strikes Mean, but Mean blocks the blow with his mechanical arm]
Strike one! He-he-he...
[Dredd strikes again - again, Mean blocks the blow]
Strike two!
[Dredd brings the bar heavily on Mean's head - a blow that would crack human skull, but leaves no impression on Mean. Fergee winces]
Strike three. You're out, lawman!
[Mean knocks the bar off Dredd's hands and advances, waving his blades. Dredd recoils, barely evades Mean's blows]
You killed Link! You killed Junior! You killed my brothers! You killed my pa...

[Mean growls and charges, but Dredd sidesteps. Mean's blades get stuck deep into the wall, so he cannot free himself. Dredd partially rips a wire from Mean's mechanism and touches its broken end at Mean's arm]
illegal use of city electricity. How do you plead?
[Mean growls in fear and rage]
I knew you'd say that!
[Dredd attaches the wire to Mean's back, elecrocuting the monstrous cyborg to death]
[Dredd does his best to ease fatally-injured Fargo, but the old man has no hope of survival. His condition deteriorates rapidly]

[gestures to one of the statues]
The blind lady...

[looks at the statue]
Who is she?
Justice... before your time. We should never have taken justice out of her hands.
You brought order to chaos, sir.
weaknesses, frailties. We created you.
You didn't create me, sir. I have a family.

[shakes his head]
No.
At the Academy, you told me they were killed when I was very young.
A lie.
I have a picture of them.
A fake. We lied... to both of you.

[puzzled]
Both?
There was another infant created in that experiment, but something went wrong. Genetically mutated to the perfect criminal.
I have a brother?
You were best friends at the Academy. Star pupils. And then he turned. And for his crimes, you judged him.
Rico?
Rico.
[shocked to hear that, Dredd stands and walks away from Fargo]
Rico... you let me judge my own brother? You never told me, sir.
I couldn't... you were like a son to me.
A son... my whole life is a lie.
Rico had to be executed to protect you, to protect the city.
[Dredd muses about what Fargo just told him. Then he realizes something]
Rico... he's alive!
No. I signed the order myself. I saw the report.

[kneels near Fargo]
I didn't kill Hammond. It was him. It was his D.N.A. that convicted me.
[Fargo stares at Dredd, then he understands who was responsible for Dredd's false conviction]
Griffin... it was Griffin.
Griffin, yes.
We've both been deceived, Joseph. I'm so sorry. Rico's killed me and destroyed you. Fi... find him, Joseph.

[softly]
Don't die.

[Fargo dies. Dredd closes his eyes in deep sorrow. Fergee lowers his head sadly. Dredd glances at the blind lady statue. He takes a gun of one of the dead guards and stand before the statue, determination grows in his heart]
What do we do?
[Dredd does not answer]
What do we do?
[Dredd turns to him, cocking the gun]
Find Rico!
Guilty as charged.
[the audience gasps in disbeleif as Dredd is holding back a disappointed face]

Joseph Dredd. You are aware that this council can only provide one punishment for your crime. Death. However, it is also a tradition that the council to honor the last order of a retiring senior Judge.
[Gets up from his seat]
Therefore, I step down.
[the audience gasps in disbelief and Dredd gives out a surprised face]
Be leniant with Judge Dredd, for this actions and his years of service.

[Gets up]
We shall honor this one, Judge Fargo.
[Fargo leaves the court]
Joseph Dredd, step forward.
[Dredd Steps forward]
Your sentence shall be, life imprisonment at Aspen Penal Colony and is to be carried out immediately.
[Holds up the Book of Law]
As it is written...

[Interrupts Griffin]
Justice Griffin, this trial has been a farce, I demand an appeal...

[Interrupts Hershey]
You will accept the court's decision, Judge Hershey.
[Several Judges come into the courtroom and secure Dredd]
Dredd, I'm sorry.

[as the Judges begin to take him away]
You did your best, hershey. Thank you.
Let the betrayal of the Law be taken from our court. May his armor be taken from him, and all of his garb of justice.
[the Judges take off his badge and tear his uniform off and cuff him]
Let him be strickened from our hearts and our memories, forever.
[Judge Hershey has stopped a man for bumping his hovercar between two other vehicles]

[checking his Unicard on the system]
Mr Souza, you have a suspended license. You've got 3 counts of driving under the influence...

[interrupting]
Hey, you'd better listen! I suggest you walk away and bother somebody else!
[Judge Dredd looms up behind him]
When I said I have powerful friends, I mean powerful!
Are we having a problem here, Hershey?
Not at all, Dredd, nothing I can't handle. Suspended license, 3 DUI's.

[smiling nervously]
Uh, this is getting boring, hey... So, uh, what's the tab? Come on, how much is this gonna cost me? You name the price.
Hmmmm... Hershey, call Control for an H-wagon.
What? I don't believe it, you're gonna tow me?
[Dredd crosses the road, Souza and Hershey follow him]
Towing is for a first offence, this is your fourth violation, you're a menace. How do you plead?
Not guilty.
I knew you'd say that.
[Dredd pulls out his Lawgiver gun]
Hey, wait a sec, what are you doing?
Grenade.
Grenade.
NOOOOOO!
[Dredd aims and fires - the hovercar explodes]
Happy motoring.
[on the flight to Aspen]
What are you doing here?
I was convicted of a crime. Wrongly convicted.

[laughs]
Really? That's kinda weird! What are the odds? Two wrongly convicted guys sitting right next to each other?
You received the sentence the law required.
Five years, just for saving my own ass? That was a mistake!
The law doesn't... make mistakes.
Really? Then how do you explain what happened to you? You can't, can you? Great. Mr. "I am the law" can't. So maybe this is some kind of typo. Maybe it's a glitch. Or maybe it's poetic justice.
